title: IIIT Kota Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 05 Teaching Associate Posts
description: The Indian Institute of Information Technology Kota (IIIT Kota) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 05 Teaching Associate Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have a B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech in Electronics Engineering, M.Sc., B.Sc., and MCA can apply for the IIIT Kota Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we ha...
